title: Chat Filter Not Working In The New Client
body:
The chat filter option, despite being re-enabled and disabled, does not work.
The in-game chat is still filtered regardless of the client setting.

replies.body:
Try hopping into the Legacy Client from the login screen, then ensure your language filter is disabled from the settings (cog icon) in the top-right of the client. Once you've done that, hop back on over to the Beta Client and let me know if this has resolved the issue.

Let me know, thanks!
I'm also now having this problem- Is the old client even still around anymore..? I'm on a new computer now so I didn't even have the chance to get the old client

Yup, the old client (Legacy) can be accessed from the login screen for the duration of the Beta phase of the new Client.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
This didn't work for me, any ideas?
I had the same problem, this worked.
